entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 25.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
